snippet: Jean Butler rose to fame in “Riverdance,” but in her 40s she is unassumedly reinventing herself as a choreographer and performer of contemporary dance.
abstract: Dancer and choreographer Jean Butler is reinventing herself in her 40s, stepping into a smaller spotlight after rising to international fame as a star of Irish step-dancing show Riverdance.
lead_paragraph: Jean Butler rose to fame in “Riverdance,” but in her 40s she is unassumedly reinventing herself as a choreographer and performer of contemporary dance.

headline.seo: Jean Butler, ‘Riverdance’ Star, Makes Her Own Work, ‘Hurry’
headline.main: Finding Fulfillment in a Smaller Spotlight
headline.print_headline: Finding Fulfillment In a Smaller Spotlight
